channel.title: geva
channel.description:
gevakun is hosted by journalists Billy Jensen and Alexis Linkletter. Each season features a deep dive investigation into a case or issue that true crime fans will be obsessed with, culminating in a special streaming on discovery+.  


Season 3, “Unraveled: Experts on Trial” investigates an alarming problem within the American criminal justice process: the business of forensic experts. It is a crisis in the courts that is decades in the making. Citing several cases as examples, Alexis Linkletter and Billy Jensen expose serious flaws with forensic expert testimony that routinely leads to tragedy and injustice within the U.S. court system. 


To follow the Unraveled investigations even further, stream the specials exclusively on discovery+. Go to discoveryplus.com/unraveled to start your 7-day free trial today.*

 

*discovery+ is currently only available for US subscribers.
channel.copyright: Discovery or its subsidiaries and affiliates. All rights reserved.
channel.itunes:subtitle: "Unraveled: The Stalker's Web" tracks the multi-decade wrath of one of the most prolific stalkers to ever prowl the cyberworld. Co-hosts Alexis Linkletter and Billy Jensen investigate his trail of destruction to unmask this deadly threat.
channel.itunes:author: discovery+

It is a crisis in the courts that is decades in the making. Citing several cases as examples, Alexis Linkletter and Billy Jensen expose serious flaws with forensic expert testimony that routinely leads to tragedy and injustice within the U.S. court system. 


To follow the Unraveled investigations even further, stream the specials exclusively on discovery+. Go to discoveryplus.com/unraveled to start your 7-day free trial today.*

item.title: S2 Ep.8: The Aftermath
item.itunes:subtitle: Billy & Alexis discuss other shocking cyberstalking cases, including a childhood friendship that turned sour, a mystery predator targeting highschoolers, and a deranged roommate who became a city-wide terrorist.

item.title: S2 Ep.6:Hiding Out
item.itunes:subtitle: After years of Jason Christopher Hughes evading authorities, federal agents use cyber-tracking to locate him, and their manhunt comes to an end when he is found in one of the most populous cities on Earth.
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: S1 Ep. 8:Damning New LISK Information + Season 2 Announcement
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Alexis Linkletter and Billy Jensen reveal damning new information from the Long Island Serial Killer case, including hidden clues unearthed from the police's own website. Plus, they preview the rest of the Unraveled anthology, inc...
item.itunes:summary:
In this episode, Alexis Linkletter and Billy Jensen reveal damning new information from the Long Island Serial Killer case, including hidden clues unearthed from the police's own website. Plus, they preview the rest of the Unraveled anthology, including the decades-long pursuit of the most prolific cyberstalker to ever strike, a stunning fresh take on a millionaire murder mystery, a shocking exposé on the world of forensic experts, and the reveal of a new breed of killer hidden among us. To follow our investigation even further, stream the special "Unraveled: The Long Island Serial Killer" exclusively on discovery+. Go to discoveryplus.com/UNRAVELED to start your 7-day free trial today.* *discovery+ is currently only available for US subscribers.  

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

item.title: S1 Ep. 5:Oak Beach
item.itunes:subtitle: A former sex worker discloses disturbing details about an encounter she had with the soon-to-be-named chief of police at a sex party in Oak Beach, a secretive community just two miles from where the LISK dumped the bodies of 11 dead sex workers. To fol...
item.itunes:summary:
A former sex worker discloses disturbing details about an encounter she had with the soon-to-be-named chief of police at a sex party in Oak Beach, a secretive community just two miles from where the LISK dumped the bodies of 11 dead sex workers. To follow our investigation even further, stream the special "Unraveled: The Long Island Serial Killer" exclusively on discovery+. Go to discoveryplus.com/UNRAVELED to start your 7-day free trial today.* *discovery+ is currently only available for US subscribers.

item.title: S1 Ep. 4:Twelve Months Of Misery
